name: Pigeon Pooper
description:
EXTREY, EXTREY READ ALL ABAWT IT!
There is a serial pigeon pooper on the loose (you). It has been causing distraught in a peaceful city by pooping on humans.

HOW TO PLAY
In this game you need to time your poop to hit the humans below you. Hitting a human will result in you moving to a higher location. From this new location you need to hit another human. If you miss you lose, if you hit a human you keep going.

GOAL
Best score wins!

*PLEASE suggest any ways I can improve or add to this game. I made it in 24 hours and its pretty basic but I like it.
